title: Rape is Not Sex
description:
In one of Shan’s toughest interviews to date, she sits down with New York Times Best Selling Author, Ashley C. Ford, who talks about her unconventional path to healing from sexual assault and how it impacted how she thought about sex. Shan also has a conversation with "Trauma Queen" Jimanekia about how to start the trauma healing process with a professional.


If you are seeking support/resources due to sexual violence, you can reach out to organizations such as RAINN (Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network) by visiting www.rain.org or call their National Sexual Assault Hotline by dialing 800.656.HOPE (4673).

Follow Shan on Instagram: www.instagram.com/shanboody
Keep up to date with Shan by joining the mailing list: www.shanboodram.com/join

Follow Ashley C. Ford on Instagram: www.instagram.com/smashfizzle
Buy Ashley’s Book: Somebody's Daughter: A Memoir https://www.amazon.com/Somebodys-Daughter-Ashley-C-Ford/dp/1250305977
Follow Jimanekia on Instagram: www.instagram.com/jimanekia
